title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list and delete models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python library.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama for local LLM chains, agents and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode, mobile friendly).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers synchronous & asynchronous APIs and Kotlin coroutines support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API; generate, chat, pull and delete models.

title: ollama-cli (community)
summary: Alternative interactive CLI written in Go with fuzzy search, syntax highlighting and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline code completions.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) plus docker-compose examples for running Ollama in containers.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for local LLM pipelines.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Community Camunda Connectors that expose Ollama generate/chat endpoints as BPMN service tasks.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node that lets you call Ollama chat/generate workflows inside no-code automation pipelines.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that need to spin up Ollama containers and run local LLM tests.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly typed async/sync APIs and streaming support for Ollama.

title: ollama-chat-qt
summary: Cross-platform Qt6 desktop chat client for Ollama with markdown rendering and model switching.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: Lightweight FastAPI wrapper that adds OpenAI-compatible endpoints on top of local Ollama.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to Ollama and supports conversation persistence and PDF QA.

title: ollama-rag-redis
summary: Redis sample project showing how to build a RAG system using Ollama embeddings and Redis vector search.
